storyTitle: As Manager, I want to set deadlines for tasks to achieve timely completion

testCases.title: Set valid future deadline successfully
preconditions: User is logged in as a Manager with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to set task deadlines
At least one task exists in the system that requires a deadline
Task deadline setting interface is accessible
System date and time are correctly configured

steps.action: Navigate to task deadline setting page
steps.expectedResult: Deadline input form is displayed with date and time input fields

steps.action: Enter a valid future date and time (e.g., 7 days from current date at 5:00 PM)
steps.expectedResult: Input is accepted without errors, date and time fields show the entered values

steps.action: Submit deadline by clicking the submit button
steps.expectedResult: Deadline is saved successfully and confirmation message is displayed to the manager

steps.action: Verify the deadline is stored in the database
steps.expectedResult: Database query shows the deadline is correctly saved with the entered date and time

steps.action: Check that notification is triggered for the assigned employee
steps.expectedResult: System logs show notification event was triggered for the employee

postconditions: Deadline is successfully saved in the task table
Confirmation message is displayed to the manager
Notification is sent to the assigned employee
Task status reflects the new deadline
Audit log records the deadline setting action

testCases.title: Reject past date as deadline
preconditions: User is logged in as a Manager with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to set task deadlines
At least one task exists in the system that requires a deadline
Task deadline setting interface is accessible
System date and time are correctly configured

steps.action: Navigate to deadline setting page
steps.expectedResult: Deadline input form is displayed with date and time input fields

steps.action: Enter a past date (e.g., yesterday's date at 3:00 PM)
steps.expectedResult: Validation error is displayed indicating that past dates cannot be set as deadlines

steps.action: Attempt to submit deadline by clicking the submit button
steps.expectedResult: Submission is blocked and error message is displayed: 'Deadline must be a future date'

steps.action: Verify that no deadline is saved in the database
steps.expectedResult: Database query confirms no new deadline entry was created

steps.action: Verify that no notification is triggered
steps.expectedResult: System logs show no notification event was triggered

postconditions: No deadline is saved in the database
Error message is displayed to the manager
No notification is sent to the employee
Task remains in its previous state without deadline changes
Form remains on the deadline setting page for correction

testCases.title: Verify deadline update processing time
preconditions: User is logged in as a Manager with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to update task deadlines
A task with an existing deadline is available in the system
Task deadline update interface is accessible
System date and time are correctly configured
Performance monitoring tools are available to measure response time

steps.action: Navigate to the task with existing deadline and open deadline update interface
steps.expectedResult: Deadline update form is displayed with current deadline pre-populated

steps.action: Update deadline with a valid future date (e.g., 10 days from current date at 2:00 PM) and note the timestamp before submission
steps.expectedResult: New deadline value is entered successfully in the input fields

steps.action: Submit the updated deadline and measure response time
steps.expectedResult: Response is received within 2 seconds and confirmation message is displayed

steps.action: Check database for updated deadline immediately after submission
steps.expectedResult: Database query shows the deadline is updated correctly with the new date and time

steps.action: Confirm confirmation message display to manager
steps.expectedResult: Success message is shown to manager indicating deadline was updated successfully

steps.action: Verify notification trigger for the employee
steps.expectedResult: System logs confirm notification event was triggered for deadline change

postconditions: Deadline is successfully updated in the task table
Update processing completed within 2 seconds SLA
Confirmation message is displayed to the manager
Notification is sent to the assigned employee about deadline change
Audit log records the deadline update action with timestamp

storyTitle: As Manager, I want to assign priority levels to tasks to achieve effective workload management

testCases.title: Assign valid priority level successfully
preconditions: User is logged in as a Manager with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to assign task priorities
At least one task exists in the system that requires priority assignment
Task priority setting interface is accessible
Predefined priority levels (Low, Medium, High) are configured in the system

steps.action: Navigate to task priority setting page
steps.expectedResult: Priority selection form is displayed with dropdown or radio buttons showing Low, Medium, and High options

steps.action: Select a valid priority level (e.g., High) from the available options
steps.expectedResult: Selection is accepted without errors and the chosen priority level is highlighted or selected

steps.action: Submit priority by clicking the submit button
steps.expectedResult: Priority is saved successfully and confirmation message is displayed to the manager

steps.action: Verify the priority is stored correctly in the database
steps.expectedResult: Database query shows the priority is correctly saved as 'High' for the task

steps.action: Check that notification is triggered for the assigned employee
steps.expectedResult: System logs show notification event was triggered for the employee about priority assignment

postconditions: Priority level is successfully saved in the task table
Confirmation message is displayed to the manager
Notification is sent to the assigned employee
Task displays the assigned priority level in the task list
Audit log records the priority assignment action

testCases.title: Reject invalid priority values
preconditions: User is logged in as a Manager with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to assign task priorities
At least one task exists in the system that requires priority assignment
Task priority setting interface is accessible
System has validation rules to accept only Low, Medium, or High priority values

steps.action: Navigate to priority setting page
steps.expectedResult: Priority selection form is displayed with predefined priority options

steps.action: Attempt to enter an invalid priority value (e.g., 'Critical' or 'Urgent' or manually input text not in predefined list)
steps.expectedResult: Validation error is displayed indicating that only Low, Medium, or High are valid priority levels

steps.action: Attempt to submit the invalid priority by clicking the submit button
steps.expectedResult: Submission is blocked and error message is displayed: 'Invalid priority value. Please select Low, Medium, or High'

steps.action: Verify that no priority is saved in the database
steps.expectedResult: Database query confirms no new priority entry was created or updated

steps.action: Verify that no notification is triggered
steps.expectedResult: System logs show no notification event was triggered

postconditions: No priority is saved or updated in the database
Error message is displayed to the manager
No notification is sent to the employee
Task remains in its previous state without priority changes
Form remains on the priority setting page for correction

testCases.title: Verify priority update processing time
preconditions: User is logged in as a Manager with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to update task priorities
A task with an existing priority level is available in the system
Task priority update interface is accessible
Performance monitoring tools are available to measure response time

steps.action: Navigate to the task with existing priority and open priority update interface
steps.expectedResult: Priority update form is displayed with current priority level pre-selected

steps.action: Update priority with a valid level (e.g., change from Medium to High) and note the timestamp before submission
steps.expectedResult: New priority level is selected successfully in the form

steps.action: Submit the updated priority and measure response time
steps.expectedResult: Response is received within 2 seconds and confirmation message is displayed

steps.action: Check database for updated priority immediately after submission
steps.expectedResult: Database query shows the priority is updated correctly to 'High'

steps.action: Confirm confirmation message display to manager
steps.expectedResult: Success message is shown to manager indicating priority was updated successfully

steps.action: Verify notification trigger for the employee
steps.expectedResult: System logs confirm notification event was triggered for priority change

postconditions: Priority level is successfully updated in the task table
Update processing completed within 2 seconds SLA
Confirmation message is displayed to the manager
Notification is sent to the assigned employee about priority change
Audit log records the priority update action with timestamp

storyTitle: As Manager, I want to modify task deadlines to achieve flexibility in scheduling

testCases.title: Modify task deadline with valid future date
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role
Manager has authorization to modify task deadlines
At least one task exists in the system with an assigned deadline
Task is in editable state
System is connected to the task database

steps.action: Navigate to the task list and select a task that needs deadline modification
steps.expectedResult: Task is selected and highlighted in the task list

steps.action: Click on the 'Edit Deadline' button or option to open the deadline edit form
steps.expectedResult: Deadline edit form is displayed showing the current deadline date in the input field

steps.action: Clear the existing deadline and enter a new valid future date (e.g., a date 7 days from today)
steps.expectedResult: New deadline date is entered in the input field without any validation errors or warnings

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Update' button to save the new deadline
steps.expectedResult: System processes the update within 2 seconds, deadline is updated in the database, and a confirmation message is displayed (e.g., 'Deadline updated successfully')

steps.action: Verify the task list displays the updated deadline for the modified task
steps.expectedResult: Task list shows the new deadline date for the selected task

steps.action: Check that the assigned employee receives a notification about the deadline change
steps.expectedResult: Notification is queued/sent to the assigned employee informing them of the deadline modification

postconditions: Task deadline is updated in the database with the new future date
Confirmation message is displayed to the manager
Deadline change is logged in the audit trail
Notification is sent to the assigned employee
Task list reflects the updated deadline

testCases.title: Reject modification with past date
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role
Manager has authorization to modify task deadlines
At least one task exists in the system with an assigned deadline
Task is in editable state
System is connected to the task database

steps.action: Navigate to the task list and select a task to modify
steps.expectedResult: Task is selected and highlighted in the task list

steps.action: Click on the 'Edit Deadline' button or option to open the deadline edit form
steps.expectedResult: Deadline edit form is displayed showing the current deadline date

steps.action: Clear the existing deadline and enter a past date (e.g., yesterday's date or any date before today)
steps.expectedResult: Past date is entered in the input field and a validation error message is displayed (e.g., 'Deadline must be a future date' or 'Past dates are not allowed')

steps.action: Attempt to click the 'Submit' or 'Update' button to save the invalid deadline
steps.expectedResult: Submission is blocked, the update button is disabled or non-functional, and the error message remains visible indicating that past dates cannot be set as deadlines

steps.action: Verify that the original deadline remains unchanged in the database
steps.expectedResult: Task retains its original deadline and no changes are saved to the database

steps.action: Close the edit form or navigate away
steps.expectedResult: Form closes without saving changes and task list shows the original deadline

postconditions: Task deadline remains unchanged in the database
No confirmation message is displayed
No deadline change is logged in the audit trail
No notification is sent to the assigned employee
Error message is displayed to the manager explaining the validation failure
